tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE privacy_impact_assessments (
  assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  assess_date DATE,
  data_subject TEXT,
  data_controller TEXT,
  data_processor TEXT,
  data_categories JSONB,
  data_processing_purpose TEXT,
  risk_assessment JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE privacy_impact_assessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_performed_by VARCHAR(255),
    data_elements_impacted VARCHAR(255),
    potential_risks VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE data_processing_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_category VARCHAR(255),
    data_processing_purpose TEXT,
    data_storage_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_evaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    risk_level ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
    risk_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE privacy_impact_assessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    data_subject VARCHAR(255),
    data_controller VARCHAR(255),
    data_processor VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE data_processing_activity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_categories VARCHAR(255),
    purpose TEXT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    data_flow_diagram TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE risk_evaluation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    risk_category VARCHAR(255),
    risk_level VARCHAR(255),
    risk_description TEXT,
    mitigation_strategy TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE assessment_review (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
    review_date DATE,
    review_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE privacy_impact_assessment (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    data_processing_activity TEXT,
    data_risk_evaluation TEXT,
    data_privacy_implications TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_processing_activities (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    activity_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_risks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_name VARCHAR(50),
    risk_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_impact_evaluation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_name VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE assessment_results (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_outcome TEXT
)
